'''Secret Room Key''' is a Quest Item used to access a hidden room in [[Enkanomiya]]. This key is used in the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]]: [[Adonis' Abandoned Safehouse]].

==Location==
The key is obtained from a [[Common Chest]] located in a hidden room under the north-western cliffs of [[The Narrows]]. This room can be accessed by solving a [[Triangular Mechanism]] puzzle while in [[Whitenight]].
